message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only able to pay up to $11000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go that low. I can meet you halfway at $12500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet you at $12500. I would like to propose $11500 as my maximum price for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I can offer you a slight discount at $12200. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's a fair price for this amazing product.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the product, but I am still unable to meet you at $12200. I would like to propose $11800 as my maximum price for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but that's as low as I can go. I'll sell the product to you for $12000. This is my final offer.

Hello Alice, thank you for your final offer. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am still unable to meet you at $12000. I would like to propose $11700 as my maximum price for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement.
